thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com | 3 of 116
thread.title: Rita Kuhn

author: Rita Kuhn
title: Rita Kuhn
text: Ezcater has made my life so much easier. I give 3-4 presentations a week all over the country and have to order lunch for anywhere from 5 people to 50 people. Ordering lunch to be delivered on time in cities I don't live was so stressful. Ezcater makes it easy to order from reputable caterers and have my orders all in one place. They also text me the morning of the lunch and confirm my order will be on time, it puts my mind at ease and lets me concentrate on my presentation. The bonus is accruing points, which travelers like me LOVE!
